introduction: Today, we'll talk about Matthew Perry's life story, and learn some advanced English vocab in this le

vocabulary.example: Listening to Matthew Perry's memoir has been really enlightening.

vocabulary.definition: attracting and holding interest or attention; enthralling
vocabulary.example: The prologue of the memoir alone is so captivating and compelling.

vocabulary.definition: recording or documenting events in order of time
vocabulary.example: He did a great job chronicling his near-death experience in the memoir.

vocabulary.definition: the use of irony to mock or convey contempt
vocabulary.example: Matthew Perry's humor and sarcasm added depth to the storytelling in his memoir.

vocabulary.definition: engrossing or compelling; holding one's interest or attention
vocabulary.example: The memoir's narrative was so gripping that I couldn't stop listening.

vocabulary.definition: an account of a person's life written by that person
vocabulary.example: Matthew Perry's memoir is an autobiography where he shares his life experiences.
